post:
**What sets us apart?**
-Juniper only network with new equipment.
-Multi 100Gbps core network (1.2+ Tbps Total Capacity) with N+1 resiliency at minimum and diverse routing.
-Great peering at LINX, LONAP, AMS-IX, DE-CIX and all major local ISP's.
-We transit with: Level3, Telia, NTT, GTT, TATA, ZAYO and Cogent which guarantees excellent connectivity - congestion free.
-LINX and LONAP partner - we can connect you to these exchanges with your own ASN.
-EU MPLS Network Spread over 7 data centres.
-Tier 3 Data centres in London, Amsterdam &  Frankfurt.
-We aim at high quality for a reasonable price.
-Clouvider is an established UK based business. We just turned 6!

**So where are the offers?**
Our current pre-configured dedicated server offers can be seen on our [Sale Page](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/dedicated-servers-sale/), subject to availability. If it’s not listed its gone! No promotional codes needed.

Additional pre-configured upgrades available:
-Additional IPv4's and Subnets from £1 per IP,
-1Gbps Unmetered Bandwidth for £15 per month.

We also have additional systems and configurations listed on our sale page.

**FAQ’s:**

*Can these servers be customised?*
RAM and Storage changes are not available on pre-configured offer servers. If you seek a different configuration please see our [standard dedicated servers](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/dedicated-servers/) which can be customised.

*Can I check your network?*
Yes, our LookingGlass can be found at [https://as62240.net/](https://as62240.net/), alternatively you can use the following test IP’s:
185.42.223.63 - London, UK
194.127.172.33 - Amsterdam, NL

*How long for deployment?*
Our standard delivery is within 3 working days.

*Do you offer IPMI Access?*
Yes, free VPN Secured IPMI access can be provided on request.

*Do you offer IPv6?*
Yes, /64 or /48 subnets can be requested during the order process.

*Can you accommodate x, y or z?*
Open a sales ticket to discuss our custom solutions, happy to help where possible.

*Any questions or queries?*
Contact our team today at [https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/)

All prices are exclusive of VAT where applicable. Stock is limited and the offers are valid subject to stock remaining. Because of the limited stock, if the order is not paid within an hour, it will be regretfully cancelled and the stock returned to the pool for others to enjoy. Subject to our standard Terms & Conditions [https://www.clouvider.co.uk/terms-conditions](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/terms-conditions). Cancellation notice period applies. Exchange rates to meet offer rules valid as of 15th Apr 2020. Offer valid whilst promotional stocks last or until the 1st May 2020, whichever comes first.
